data.title: St. George Theatre
data.meta_site_name: St. George Theatre - Official Website - St. George Theatre - Official Website
data.text:
The St. George Theatre Restoration Inc., a 501(c)3 non-profit organization, is dedicated to the restoration of the historic theatre and its development as a cultural and performing arts center for Staten Island and all of New York City by providing community outreach, educational programs and public performances.

St. George Theatre Restoration, Inc.’s programs are made possible by the New York State Council on the Arts with the support of the Office of the Governor and the New York State Legislature.

St. George Theatre Restoration, Inc.’s programs are supported, in part, by public funds from the New York City Department of Cultural Affairs in partnership with the City Council.

St. George Theatre Restoration, Inc. is supported, in part, by Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand, Congressmember Nicole Malliotakis, Assemblyman Charles Fall, Honorable Michael Cusick, Borough President Vito Fossella, Senator Jessica Scarcella-Spanton, Councilman Joseph Borelli, and Councilman David Carr.

St. George Theatre Restoration, Inc.’s community sponsorships are Amazon, Con Edison, Hanley Funeral Home, Gateway Arms Realty, Empire State Bank, JPMorgan Chase & Co, National Grid, Rampulla & Newstad LLP, Richmond University Medical Center, Staten Island University Hospital/ Northwell Health, ShopRite, Vincent Gruppuso Foundation, Victor & Clara C. Battin Foundation, Williams Eye Works and numerous businesses and individual donors.

Thank you to our Elected Officials, Past & Present, Legacy Giving

Profound appreciation to our elected officials who supported our capital projects through the years, that allowed us to continue with our mission of restoration for the historic St. George Theatre.

U.S. Senator Charles Schumer, U.S. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand, Representative Nicole Malliotakis, NYS Assemblymember John W. LaVelle, NYS Senator John Marchi, NYS Assemblymember Janele Hyer-Spencer, NYS Senator Andrew Lanza, NYS Assemblymember Michael Cusick, NYS Assemblymember Charles Fall, NYS Senator Jessica Scarcella-Spanton, Mayor Michael Bloomberg, Borough President James P. Molinaro, Borough President James Oddo, Borough President Vito Fossella, NYC Councilmember Mike McMahon, NYC Councilmember Debi Rose, NYC Councilmember Steven Matteo, NYC Councilmember David Carr, NYC Councilmember Joseph Borelli
